LanguageData.VFEA_AncientBed.label: старовинна кровать
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientBed.description: An old-fashioned metal bed frame with a hard mattress and uncomfortable duvet.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientBed_Blueprint_Install.label: ancient bed (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEA_WallLamp.label: настінна лампа
LanguageData.VFEA_WallLamp.description: An electrical wall lamp, ideal to light up corridors in a vault.
LanguageData.VFEA_WallLamp_Blueprint.label: wall lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEA_WallLamp_Blueprint_Install.label: wall lamp (blueprint)
LanguageData.VFEA_WallLamp_Frame.label: wall lamp (building)
LanguageData.VFEA_WallLamp_Frame.description: An electrical wall lamp, ideal to light up corridors in a vault.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientCryptosleepSuspender.label: старовинна капсула криптосну
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientCryptosleepSuspender.descrip: An ancient medical pod that uses partial cryptosleep to slow down the degredation of wounds and help the body heal, although with the same side effects of cryptosleep, albeit at a lesser severity.\n\nThis structure was built by a long forgotten civilisation and the technology can no longer be replicated. It will never suffer breakdowns, and it operates more efficiently during solar flare incidents.
LanguageData.VFEA_AncientCryptosleepSuspender_Frame.d: An ancient medical pod that uses partial cryptosleep to slow down the degredation of wounds and help the body heal, although with the same side effects of cryptosleep, albeit at a lesser severity.\n\nThis structure was built by a long forgotten civilisation and the technology can no longer be replicated. It will never suffer breakdowns, and it operates more efficiently during solar flare incidents.
